SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.move

Class MovePlayer

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.move.MovePlayer
public class MovePlayer extends Object

PlatformerPlain

The class includes functionalities for jumping, moving left and right, dashing, climbing, and interacting with game entities like coins, enemies, and spikes.

Author:
Changyu Li

  • Constructor Details

    • MovePlayer

      public MovePlayer(Entity player, ArrayList<Entity> platforms, ArrayList<Enemy> enemies, ArrayList<Ladder> ladders, ArrayList<Spike> spikes, ArrayList<Coin> coinMap, int levelWidth, HashMap<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode,Boolean> keys)
      Constructor to initialize the MovePlayer object.
      Parameters:
      player - The Entity object representing the player.
      platforms - A list of platform entities in the game.
      enemies - A list of enemy entities in the game.
      ladders - A list of ladder entities in the game.
      spikes - A list of spike entities in the game.
      coinMap - A list of coin entities in the game.
      levelWidth - The width of the current level.
      keys - A HashMap storing the state of keyboard keys.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the player movement and state based on the current inputs and interactions. This method processes input for movement, jumping, dashing, and climbing.

    • getPlayerPosition

      public static Coord2D getPlayerPosition()
      Gets the current position of the player.
      Returns:
      The player's current position as a Coord2D object.

    • getMoveData

      public MoveData getMoveData()
      Gets the current move data of the player.
      Returns:
      The current MoveData of the player.
